A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi excels in all the areas where it’s recent predecessors struggled: strong characters\, “thinker” moments\, unforeseen plot twists\, and above all a willingness to take risks and expand Star Wars past simple lightsaber battles and derivative plots salvaged from prior movies. Recommend for all Star Wars fans and for others looking to delve a little deeper into what makes the Star Wars universe such a timeless sci-fi adventure.
